title: Rural sabotage plays havoc with opening of Paris Olympics
content: There is tight security for the opening ceremony, but saboteurs struck rail lines miles outside the city.
summary: There is tight security for the opening ceremony, but saboteurs struck rail lines miles outside the city.

title: Leader of Mexico's Sinaloa drug cartel arrested in Texas
content: El Mayo co-founded the notorious Sinaloa crime syndicate with El Chapo, who is currently jailed in the US.
summary: El Mayo co-founded the notorious Sinaloa crime syndicate with El Chapo, who is currently jailed in the US.

title: Obamas endorse Kamala Harris for president

title: 'Boneless' chicken wings can have bones, US court rules

title: Rain and cooler weather bring relief from Jasper fire
content: Fire crews are taking advantage of the pause from hot and dry conditions to battle the still out-of-control blaze.

title: Bangladesh police detain protest leaders at hospital
content: They were being treated for injuries they say were sustained after police tortured them in detention.

title: Death penalty fears for Niger ex-president - lawyer
content: A year on from the coup ousted President Mohamed Bazoum may face treason charges, his lawyers.

title: Australian hockey star amputates finger to play at Olympics
content: Matt Dawson broke his finger only two weeks ago but will join the Kookaburras in their medal campaign.
